snippet: The Patriots earned a first-round bye in the playoffs — a valuable week off that will let the players rest their legs and the coordinators schedule their job interviews....
lead_paragraph: The Patriots earned a first-round bye in the playoffs — a valuable week off that will let the players rest their legs and the coordinators schedule their job interviews.

headline.main: Pats Coordinators Burnish Resume While on Super Bowl Run
headline.print_headline: Pats Coordinators Burnish Resume While on Super Bowl Run
